title: Kjell N. Lindgren
summary: Kjell Norwood Lindgren (born January 23, 1973) is an American astronaut who was selected in 2009.[1] Lindgren was selected in June 2009 as a member of the NASA Astronaut Group 20. He launched to the International Space Station (ISS) as part of Expedition 44/45 on July 22, 2015.[2][3]
